name: Spaceman (itch) (Matheus Palheta)
description:
SPACEMAN

Fly over the surface of a comet and test your skills as an intergalactic astronaut dodging its destructive trail.

HOW TO PLAY

Player 1: Right Ctrl: Thrust Up

Player 2: Spacebar: Thrust Up

CREDITS

Programming: Matheus Palheta, Luiz Gama

Design: Artur Fernandez

This game was made with resources from UEA LUDUS (https://www.facebook.com/uealuduslab)
